long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uses the unofficial Jisho.org API to make it easier to look up dictionary entries in browser. Search any English or Japanese word and get results without leaving the page.

Please note: the first search after a period of inactivity may take a while to load. This is normal, and subsequent searches will load faster.

If you are interested, you can view this project and even make a pull request at https://github.com/Di-Falco/jisho-extension
